title.rendered: Ethereum Goes Inflationary Amid Wave of Negative Sentiment Against Rollups

content.rendered: While there are several theories about the cause of this, many revolve around Ethereum’s scaling path, adopting L2 structures that interfere with the burn mechanisms designed to prevent this. Ethereum Inflation Goes Positive: Are L2s Guilty? Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency ecosystem in the industry, is experiencing widespread criticism due to its poor price performance and […]
